name: Imprint (v0.1)
description:
A 15-minute exploration story about waking up wrong.

I used Twine to prototype the story and level design of the narrative exploration game I'm working on and I really enjoyed the result. For GDC I thought it would be fun to rewrite that prototype into a little standalone that goes in a darker direction than I chose for the game.

CW: death, body horror (I think that's the best term for it?)

Follow me here or on twitter for updates about the other game, which will be much longer! With ✨graphics!✨
